languages.text: "Но мы все еще не знаем, кто стоял за подделкой документов, организацией бунтов, заговором и покушением. Кто-то творит темные дела и сеет смуту прямо под носом ваших подданных. Оставлять это без внимания... опасно".

traits.locale_text: "Но мы все еще не знаем, кто стоял за подделкой документов, организацией бунтов, заговором и покушением. Кто-то творит темные дела и сеет смуту прямо под носом у Вольного Торговца. Для благополучия вашей торговой империи я рекомендую незамедлительно разобраться с этим".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."
languages.original_text: "Но мы все еще не знаем, кто стоял за подделкой документов, организацией бунтов, заговором и покушением. Кто-то творит темные дела и сеет смуту прямо под носом ваших подданных. Оставлять это без внимания... опасно".

traits.locale_text: "But we still do not know about the ones behind the forgeries, riots, the conspiracy and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their dark deeds and sowing chaos right under the noses of your subjects. To leave them be would be... Dangerous."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But we still do not know about the ones behind the forgeries, riots, the conspiracy and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their dark deeds and sowing chaos right under the noses of your subjects. To leave them be would be... Dangerous."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But we still do not know about the ones behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their dirty deeds and sowing chaos right under the noses of your subjects. To let them be would be... dangerous."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But we still do not know about the ones behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their dirty deeds and sowing chaos right under the noses of your subjects. To let them be would be... dangerous."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「しかしながら、文書偽造、暴動、陰謀、そして暗殺未遂の裏にいる者は未だ掴めていません。何者かが卑劣な行いに手を染め、渾沌の種をまさにあなたの臣下の鼻先に撒いています。奴らを野放しにしておくのは…危険です」
languages.original_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."

traits.locale_text: 「しかしながら、文書偽造、暴動、陰謀、そして暗殺未遂の裏にいる者は未だ掴めていません。何者かが卑劣な行いに手を染め、渾沌の種をまさにあなたの臣下の鼻先に撒いています。奴らを野放しにしておくのは…危険です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “不过，伪造文件、鼓动骚乱、阴谋刺杀的幕后黑手究竟是谁，我们还没查出来。有人正在您的臣民眼皮底下进行邪恶的勾当，引发混乱。如果继续放任下去……恐怕会很危险。”
languages.original_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."

traits.locale_text: “不过，伪造文件、鼓动骚乱、阴谋刺杀的幕后黑手究竟是谁，我们还没查出来。有人正在您的臣民眼皮底下进行邪恶的勾当，引发混乱。如果继续放任下去……恐怕会很危险。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Cela dit, nous ignorons toujours qui est à l'origine des faux documents, des révoltes, du complot et de la tentative d'assassinat. Quelqu'un agit dans l'ombre pour essayer de semer le chaos parmi vos sujets. Il serait pour le moins... dangereux de laisser le coupable libre de ses mouvements. »
languages.original_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, nous ignorons toujours qui est à l'origine des faux documents, des révoltes, du complot et de la tentative d'assassinat. Quelqu'un agit dans l'ombre pour essayer de semer le chaos parmi vos sujets. Il serait pour le moins... dangereux de laisser le coupable libre de ses mouvements. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Pero seguimos sin saber quién está detrás de las falsificaciones, los disturbios, el complot y el intento de asesinato. Alguien está haciendo todo esto y sembrando el caos delante de sus súbditos. Ignorar esta situación sería... una decisión muy arriesgada».
languages.original_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."

traits.locale_text: «Pero seguimos sin saber quién está detrás de las falsificaciones, los disturbios, el complot y el intento de asesinato. Alguien está haciendo todo esto y sembrando el caos delante de sus súbditos. Ignorar esta situación sería... una decisión muy arriesgada».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Aber wir wissen noch immer nicht, wer hinter den Fälschungen, den Aufständen, den Intrigen und dem versuchten Attentat steckt. Jemand begeht vor den Augen Eurer Untertanen üble Schandtaten und sät Chaos. Diesen Stein nicht umzudrehen, wäre ... gefährlich."
languages.original_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Aber wir wissen noch immer nicht, wer hinter den Fälschungen, den Aufständen und dem Attentatsversuch steckt. Jemand begeht direkt unter der Nase Eurer Untertanen üble Schandtaten und sät Chaos. Sie einfach walten zu lassen, wäre ... gefährlich."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak sahte evrakların, isyanların, entrikanın ve suikast girişiminin ardında kimlerin olduğunu hâlâ bilmiyoruz. Birileri göz göre göre hayırsız ameller işleyip kargaşa çıkarmaya çalışıyor. Bu işi oluruna bırakmak... Tehlike teşkil eder."
languages.original_text: "But we still do not know who was behind the forgeries, the riots, the plot, and the assassination attempt. Someone is committing their foul deeds and sowing chaos right under your subjects' noses. To leave that stone unturned would be... dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak sahte evrakların, isyanların, entrikanın ve suikast girişiminin ardında kimlerin olduğunu hâlâ bilmiyoruz. Birileri göz göre göre hayırsız ameller işleyip kargaşa çıkarmaya çalışıyor. Bu işi kendi hâline bırakmak... tehlike teşkil eder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
